name: jaoi3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wo(w0, wa(wn(w0), w1)), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wo(w0, wa(wn(w0), w1)), w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, wa(wn(w0), w1)), w2)
-| wi(w0, w2)
-| wi(wa(wn(w0), w1), w2)

comment: Inference separating a disjunct of an antecedent. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2018.)
